byline.contributor: Julfikar Ali Manik reported from Dhaka, and Nida Najar from New Delhi.
byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and NIDA NAJAR

abstract: Bangladeshi officials say Canadian man Tamim Ahmed Chowdhury was killed in shootout with police in raid outside Dhaka; Chowdhury was suspected of planning attack on bakery in July, which Islamic State group took credit for.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Tamim Ahmed Chowdhury, a Canadian citizen, was believed to have organized the July assault on the Holey Artisan Bakery, which left 22 dead.
snippet: Tamim Ahmed Chowdhury, a Canadian citizen, was believed to have organized the July assault on the Holey Artisan Bakery, which left 22 dead....

headline.main: Bangladesh Police Kill Man Suspected of Planning Dhaka Bakery Attack
headline.print_headline: Top Suspect in Bangladesh Bakery Attack Is Killed by Police
